TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Rfc2898DeriveBytes extends System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes

summary.span: 依據 使用虛擬亂數產生器，實作密碼式的金鑰衍生功能 PBKDF2。

span.span: Implements password-based key derivation functionality, PBKDF2, by using a pseudo-random number generator based on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受密碼、 salt 和反覆項目計數，並再產生索引鍵，透過呼叫方法。 takes a password, a salt, and an iteration count, and then generates keys through calls to the method. RFC 2898 包含密碼和 salt，建立金鑰和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 您可以使用 PBKDF2，密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式，來衍生金鑰使用的虛擬隨機函式，以產生幾乎不受限制長度的金鑰。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 類別可以用來產生衍生的金鑰的基底的索引鍵與其他參數。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 密碼金鑰衍生函式中的基底的索引鍵是密碼，而其他參數則是 salt 值和反覆項目計數。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 如需 PBKDF2 的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2898"PKCS #5： 密碼型密碼編譯規格 2.0 版中，"上可用[要求註解的網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 完整的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 5.2，"PBKDF2，"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以從組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼，利用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來建立兩個相同的索引鍵類別。The following code example uses the class to create two identical keys for the class. 然後它會加密，並解密相同的索引鍵的資料。It then encrypts and decrypts some data using the keys. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#1)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

span.span: The key salt used to derive the key.

summary.span: 使用密碼和 Salt 來衍生金鑰，以初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a password and salt to derive the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必須為 8 個位元組或更大。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger. RFC 2898 包含密碼和 salt，建立金鑰和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 您可以使用 PBKDF2，密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式，來衍生金鑰使用的虛擬隨機函式，以產生幾乎不受限制長度的金鑰。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 類別可以用來產生衍生的金鑰的基底的索引鍵與其他參數。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 密碼金鑰衍生函式中的基底的索引鍵是密碼，而其他參數則是 salt 值和反覆項目計數。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 如需 PBKDF2 的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2898"PKCS #5： 密碼型密碼編譯規格 2.0 版中，"上可用[要求註解的網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 完整的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 5.2，"PBKDF2，"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以從組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼，利用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來建立兩個相同的索引鍵類別。The following code example uses the class to create two identical keys for the class. 然後它會加密，並解密相同的索引鍵的資料。It then encrypts and decrypts some data using the keys. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#1)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必須為 8 個位元組或更大。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger. RFC 2898 包含密碼和 salt，建立金鑰和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 您可以使用 PBKDF2，密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式，來衍生金鑰使用的虛擬隨機函式，以產生幾乎不受限制長度的金鑰。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 類別可以用來產生衍生的金鑰的基底的索引鍵與其他參數。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 密碼金鑰衍生函式中的基底的索引鍵是密碼，而其他參數則是 salt 值和反覆項目計數。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 如需 PBKDF2 的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2898"PKCS #5： 密碼型密碼編譯規格 2.0 版中，"上可用[要求註解的網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 完整的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 5.2，"PBKDF2，"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以從組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼，利用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必須為 8 個位元組或更大，而且反覆項目計數必須小於或等於零。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger and the iteration count must be greater than zero. 建議的最小反覆項目數目是 1000年。The minimum recommended number of iterations is 1000. RFC 2898 包含密碼和 salt，建立金鑰和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 您可以使用 PBKDF2，密碼為基礎的金鑰衍生函式，來衍生金鑰使用的虛擬隨機函式，以產生幾乎不受限制長度的金鑰。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 類別可以用來產生衍生的金鑰的基底的索引鍵與其他參數。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 密碼金鑰衍生函式中的基底的索引鍵是密碼，而其他參數則是 salt 值和反覆項目計數。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 如需 PBKDF2 的詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2898"PKCS #5： 密碼型密碼編譯規格 2.0 版中，"上可用[要求註解的網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 完整的詳細資訊，請參閱區段 5.2，"PBKDF2，"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以從組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼，利用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、 使用十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

exception.span: 這個參數需要非負數的數字。

span.span: This parameter requires a non-negative number.

MemberSignature.Value: public Rfc2898DeriveBytes (byte[] password, byte[] salt, int iterations, System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(unsigned int8[] password, unsigned int8[] salt, int32 iterations, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm) cil managed
Public Sub New (password As Byte(), salt As Byte(), iterations As Integer, hashAlgorithm As HashAlgorithmName)
public: Rfc2898DeriveBytes(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ password, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ salt, int iterations, System::Security::Cryptography::HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm);

param.name: password
param.span: 用來衍生金鑰的密碼。

span.span: The password to use to derive the key.

param.name: salt
param.span: 用來衍生金鑰的金鑰 Salt。

span.span: The key salt to use to derive the key.

param.name: iterations
param.span: 操作的重複次數。

span.span: The number of iterations for the operation.

param.name: hashAlgorithm
param.span: 要用來衍生金鑰的雜湊演算法。

summary.span: 將 類別的新執行個體初始化，該類別使用指定的密碼、salt、反覆項目數和雜湊演算法名稱來衍生金鑰。

summary.span: 從 物件衍生密碼編譯金鑰。

The derived key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此函式是 Crypto API 函式 CryptDeriveKey()，包裝函式，為了提供互通性與使用 Crypto API 的應用程式。This function is a wrapper for the Crypto API function CryptDeriveKey(), and is intended to offer interoperability with applications using the Crypto API. 如果`keySize`參數設定為 0 位元時，使用指定的演算法的預設大小。If the `keySize` parameter is set to 0 bits, the default key size for the specified algorithm is used.

span.span: The parameter is incorrect.
-or-

-or-

span.span: The parameter is not a valid algorithm name.
-or-

exception.span: 參數不是有效的雜湊演算法名稱。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid hash algorithm name.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] GetBytes (int cb);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetBytes(int32 cb) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetBytes (cb As Integer) As Byte()
public: override cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GetBytes(int cb);

param.name: cb
param.span: 要產生的似隨機金鑰位元組數量。

span.span: The number of pseudo-random key bytes to generate.

summary.span: 傳回這個物件的似隨機金鑰。

span.span: Returns the pseudo-random key for this object.

returns.span: 位元組陣列，以虛擬隨機金鑰位元組填入。

span.span: A byte array filled with pseudo-random key bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作功能 PBKDF2 使用虛擬亂數產生器根據。The class implements PBKDF2 functionality by using a pseudorandom number generator based on . 類別會採用密碼、 salt 和反覆項目計數，然後再產生金鑰，透過呼叫方法。The class takes a password, a salt, and an iteration count, and then generates keys through calls to the method. 重複的呼叫這個方法不會產生相同的索引鍵。相反地，附加的兩個呼叫方法`cb`參數值的`20`就相當於呼叫方法一次使用`cb`參數值的`40`。Repeated calls to this method will not generate the same key; instead, appending two calls of the method with a `cb` parameter value of `20` is the equivalent of calling the method once with a `cb` parameter value of `40`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來取得執行個體索引鍵。The following example shows how to use the method to get the key for an instance of . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#2)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#2)]

span.span: is out of range.

exception.span: 這個參數需要非負數的數字。

span.span: This parameter requires a non-negative number.

summary.span: 取得或設定操作的重複次數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of iterations for the operation.
The number of iterations for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反覆項目計數是執行作業的次數。Iteration count is the number of times an operation is performed. 這個方法，計數必須大於零。For this method, the count should be greater than zero. 建議的最小反覆項目數目是 1000年。The minimum recommended number of iterations is 1000. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示用於產生金鑰的反覆項目數目。The following example shows how to use the property to display the number of iterations used in the generation of the key. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#3)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#3)]

span.span: The number of iterations is less than 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已修改的 salt 或反覆項目計數，會自動呼叫這個方法。This method is automatically called if the salt or iteration count is modified. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#5)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] Salt { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8[] Salt
Public Property Salt As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Salt { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.

value.span: 用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

span.span: The key salt value for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt，一組隨機的位元組，可用來讓未經授權的解密更加困難的訊息。Salt, a random set of bytes, is used to make unauthorized decrypting of a message more difficult. 字典攻擊是攻擊者嘗試藉由比較加密的值與最可能的索引鍵的先前計算加密值解密加密的訊息。A dictionary attack is an attack in which the attacker attempts to decrypt an encrypted message by comparing the encrypted value with previously computed encrypted values for the most likely keys. 這種攻擊進行更為困難的 salt，或隨機位元組，結尾之前的金鑰衍生密碼的簡介。This attack is made much more difficult by the introduction of salt, or random bytes, at the end of the password before the key derivation.

exception.span: 指定的 Salt 大小小於 8 個位元組。

span.span: The specified salt size is smaller than 8 bytes.
The salt is .
